entities.name: phoenix lament
entities.description: The title of a book mentioned in the conversation.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as whispering to someone. She is the Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as saying something savagely. He was the one who helped the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people with a Dark Mark on their foreheads, who are being chased by Harry and others.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as emerging out of the dust along with a boy. None of them were attacked.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is mentioned as being one of the Death Eaters who came back.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as saying something in a hollow voice. She and others let the Death Eaters pass thinking they were being chased.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as explaining what happened when Snape and the boy emerged out of the dust.

entities.name: barrier
entities.description: A barrier that was blocking the stairs. It was broken by a hex fired off by a Death Eater.

relationships.description: Harry helped the Death Eaters, not to stop them but to help them. This is mentioned in the conversation between Harry and McGonagall.
Snape emerged out of the dust along with a boy, who was Greyback. This is mentioned by Lupin in the conversation.
Tonks and others let the Death Eaters pass thinking they were being chased. This is mentioned by Tonks in a hollow voice.
